adventuregame.enemies module¶

class enemies.Enemy(name, hp, damage)¶

Bases: object

The super class of all enemytypes in the game.

name¶

Name of the enemy.

Type

str

hp¶

Remaining Healt Points of the enemy.

Type

int

damage¶

Damage Value the enemy does to the player.

Type

int

is_alive()¶
